snippet: A drop in unemployment to the lowest rate since 2008 along with signs of low inflation cheered investors, who fled traditional safe havens like gold and bonds.
abstract: All major stock indexes rise sharply as investors react to positive jobs report.
lead_paragraph: A drop in unemployment to the lowest rate since 2008 along with signs of low inflation cheered investors, who fled traditional safe havens like gold and bonds.

headline.main: Encouraging Jobs Report Fuels Sharp Rise in Market
headline.print_headline: Encouraging Jobs Report Fuels Sharp Rise in Market
